title: R44408
content: The United States is ramping up cybersecurity efforts in response to increasing online attacks. Cybercriminals and nation-state hackers, particularly from China, Russia, Iran, and North Korea, pose significant threats by compromising companies and government agencies for espionage and data theft. A CRS report provides annotated descriptions of authoritative sources on cybercrime, data breaches, hacking, and security, emphasizing recent publications from various government agencies, think tanks, academic institutions, and news organizations. Table 1 - cybercrime, data breaches, security, hacking, real-time attack maps, statistics Table 2 - national security, cyber espionage, cyberwar, Stuxnet, China, Dark Web Table 3 - Internet of Things (IoT), smart cities, cloud computing, FedRAMP
